messages.title: Candidate's Personal Message
messages.content: As we move forward from the most unsettling crisis since the Second World War, there is a renewed hunger and belief in the possibility of doing politics better. The Tories have staggered from one shambles to another, undermining the very essence of a hard-fought democracy, and you, the electorate, deserve better.

messages.title: Just for the record!
messages.content: Martin Docherty has spoken in 211 debates in just 2 years, significantly more than his predecessor did over a 5-year period. Martin Docherty has held 80 traditional as well as pop-up surgeries over 11 different locations across West Dunbartonshire and handed over 4300 cases.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election was of course unexpected only two years into a five year term, and is more to do with Theresa May's need to deflect from the state of the U.K. economy and the Brexit fiasco.

issues.economy: The Tories have staggered from one shambles to another, undermining the very essence of a hard-fought democracy, and you, the electorate, deserve better.
issues.governance: The Tories have staggered from one shambles to another, undermining the very essence of a hard-fought democracy

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been an honour to represent you as your MP for the last two years. At the last election, I promised hard work and represent everyone, no matter how they voted. I believe I have fulfilled that promise.

politicalExperience.achievements: Became Scotland’s youngest Councillor to then Clydeside’s first ever SNP Councillor.
